Detailed Description

Implements the IRow interface by gettings values from a System.Xml.XmlElement object using the provided fieldName.

This class is used when the Grid control makes a save data request and the rows of data that have been changed are provided as an xml document in the request body. This class uses a ColumnsEntity class to help translate between the fieldName provided and the attribute name used by the Nitobi compressed XML.
